short_summary: Fishway Replacement at Lomond River, NL.
description: Fishway Replacement at Lomond River, NL. in the St. John's Area, NL. The services required includes necessary upgrades to Tower Road and construction of a new fishway structure that will have a full flow. The contract duration will last six months with the option of a four-month extension, for a total of 20 months, depending on the performance of the contractor. The TRTC will be responsible for conducting regular meetings with PW-PWD during the term of the contract. The contractible period will commence on the date when the contract comes into effect.
